title: Istiazah
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ السَّمِيعِ الْعَلِيمِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
translation_ms: Aku berlindung kepada Allah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui daripada syaitan yang direjam
translation_en: I seek refuge in Allah the All-Hearing and All-Knowing from the accursed devil

title: Al-Fatihah
translation_ms: Segala puji bagi Allah Tuhan sekalian alam
translation_en: All praise is due to Allah Lord of the worlds

title: Al-Baqarah 2
translation_ms: Kitab ini tidak ada keraguan padanya
translation_en: This is the Book in which there is no doubt

title: Al-Baqarah 3
translation_ms: Mereka yang beriman kepada yang ghaib
translation_en: Those who believe in the unseen

title: Al-Baqarah 4
translation_ms: Mereka yang beriman kepada apa yang diturunkan kepadamu
translation_en: And who believe in what has been revealed to you

title: Al-Baqarah 5
translation_ms: Mereka itulah yang mendapat petunjuk dari Tuhan mereka
translation_en: Those are upon guidance from their Lord

title: Ayat Kursi
transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa Huwa haiyyul qayyum
translation_ms: Allah tidak ada Tuhan selain Dia
translation_en: Allah there is no deity except Him
